title: Peppers with chickpeas and harissa
description: Fire up peppers and chickpeas with spicy harissa paste for a quick, tasty weeknight supper.Each serving provides 200kcal, 2.4g protein, 30g carbohydrate (of which 11g sugars), 7g fat (of which 1g saturates), 5g fibre and 1.1g salt.
ingredients: 1 red pepper, seeded and sliced into eight strips
1 yellow pepper, seeded and sliced into eight strips
450g/1lb jar of cooked chickpeas in water
